name: Funding Transactions for MoneySend
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for non-face-to-face transactions.
description:
Identifies a Funding Transaction governed by the Standards set forth
in the Mastercard MoneySend and Funding Transactions Program
Standards manual.
MCC 6538 must not be used to identify a Funding Transaction
conducted for purposes of funding any of the activities described in
section 9.1 of the Security Rules and Procedures (the appropriate
MCC for each such activity must be used)..
